name: Forest Rabbit: Adventures
description:
Forest Rabbit is a platforming platform with coin collecting for opening the next level that would go up in level you need to collect, keys. Here moles, birds that throw exploding eggs and other animals that try to catch up with you or knock them down in some kind of swamp. Many different swinging platforms and objects with dynamic physics. Funny animation, nice music and easy to learn gameplay.

- Enjoy the flashing speed and physicality, move forward and control the movements.
- A lot of forest animals, each with a special application and dynamic physics
- Avoid obstacles and move on the game.
- You need to collect coins to unlock new levels!
- Atmospheric 2D platformer
- Bright game

Meet you in the game!
